tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE GroceryLists (
  list_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  dietary_restrictions TEXT,
  budget DECIMAL,
  nutritional_needs JSON
);

CREATE TABLE grocery_lists (
    list_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    dietary_restrictions STRING,
    budget DECIMAL,
    nutritional_needs STRING
);

CREATE TABLE grocery_items (
    item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    list_id INT,
    item_name STRING,
    category STRING,
    quantity INT,
    price DECIMAL,
    nutrition_info STRING
);

CREATE TABLE grocery_lists (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    list_name VARCHAR(50),
    dietary_restrictions VARCHAR(100),
    budget DECIMAL(10,2),
    nutritional_needs TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE groceries (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(50),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL(10,2),
    calories INT,
    quantity INT,
    list_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (list_id) REFERENCES grocery_lists(id)
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    password VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE GroceryLists (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    list_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    dietary_restrictions TEXT[],
    budget DECIMAL NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Items (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    category TEXT NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    nutritional_value JSON
);

CREATE TABLE GroceryLists (
	grocery_list_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	user_id INT,
	dietary_restrictions VARCHAR(255),
	budget DECIMAL,
	nutritional_needs TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Users (
	user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	username VARCHAR(50),
	email_address VARCHAR(255),
	dietary_preferences VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Items (
	item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	item_name VARCHAR(100),
	category VARCHAR(50),
	calories INT,
	price DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE UserPreferences (
	user_id INT,
	dietary_restrictions VARCHAR(255),
	budget DECIMAL,
	nutritional_needs TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE GroceryListItems (
	grocery_list_id INT,
	item_id INT,
	quantity INT,
	is_checked BOOLEAN
)
